thread.title: Get Your Free Cat Quest Download Now! Limited Time Offer at Epic Games Store
thread.title_full: Get Your Free Cat Quest Download Now! Limited Time Offer at Epic Games Store

author: archyde
title: Get Your Free Cat Quest Download Now! Limited Time Offer at Epic Games Store
text:
2023-12-29 01:22:10
Epic Games Store has a free download event every day at the end of the year, and today it launched the popular game “
Cat Quest Cat Quest“of Free download for a limited time. Players can collect it for free from now until 00:00 on December 30, 2023, so they can play and enjoy it at any time even after the event ends.
“Cat Quest” is an open RPG game set in the world of magical cats. Players will embark on this grand adventure to find the evil Dracos and his kidnapped sister! In the game, players can explore the open map of the Kingdom of Cats, search for high-end loot in extremely dangerous dungeons, and extend their cat hands to help furry guys complete a series of side tasks.
Advertisement (Please continue reading this article)
The completely real-time action combat system allows players to get close to the enemy and then slash, roll to avoid the enemy’s counterattack, or use powerful magic to eliminate all enemies! Players can also enhance the combat power of their cats through the combination of various powerful equipment and create their strongest cat warriors to enjoy this adventure.
